about-us-content-1: TODOS began in Cairo in 2021 not as a large corporation, but as a small, passionate team that recognized a gap in the market for trustworthy medical supplies
about-us-content-2: We started with gloves. Not the cheapest, but the safest the kind we’d choose for our own families. With every shipment, our foundation grew stronger in care, honesty, and purpose.
about-us-quote: We don't just deliver products — we deliver trust, care, and the assurance of quality in every box.
our-journey-content: Since 2021, TODOS has grown into a trusted medical supplies partner across multiple continents.
our-achievements-content: Since 2021, TODOS has supplied over 1 million cartons of premium medical gloves and supplies to healthcare providers around the globe.
its-about: It’s about trust, safety, and real human connection
reliable-distribution: Reliable Distribution Serving Multiple Sectors Worldwide

OVERVIEW.who-we-are-content-1: Founded in 2021, TODOS is dedicated to supporting the medical sector with high-quality, reliable supplies. Since our inception, we've focused on building trust through consistency, professionalism, and a deep understanding of our clients' needs
OVERVIEW.who-we-are-content-2: TODOS began with medical-grade gloves as the exclusive distributor of the 'FitOne' brand in the Middle East. We quickly rose to become a market lead er in Egypt and established the launchpad for the 'FitPro' brand regionally. TODOS is officially registered with the Egyptian Drug Authority and Central Administration of Medical Devic es, holding all necessary legal permits.
OVERVIEW.what-we-do-content-1: TODOS specializes in importing and supplying medical examination gloves in all types—nitrile, latex, vinyl, and more ensuring safety and comfort across healthcare sectors. We also offer a curated range of specialized medical devices selected for their performance and international compliance.
OVERVIEW.what-we-do-content-2: Our goal: Deliver reliable, top-tier products that meet the evolving demands of modern medicine.

TESTIMONIALS.first-review: The medical gloves from TODOS are incredibly durable and comfortable. We’ve been using them in our clinic daily and never had a single issue. Highly recommended!
TESTIMONIALS.second-review: I’ve been using TODOS protein shakes after workouts, and they taste amazing while delivering real results. Clean ingredients and excellent value!
TESTIMONIALS.third-review: The face masks are top quality — soft, breathable, and provide excellent protection. We trust TODOS for all our medical supply needs.

IDENTITY.our-mission-content: To deliver reliable, high-quality medical and hygiene products that protect people in hospitals, homes, salons, and kitchens alike.
IDENTITY.our-vision-content: To become a trusted name in every hand that wears our gloves or depends on our products.
